name: Charlie 'Ungry
description: '''Charlie 'Ungry''' is a British [[rock music|rock]] band that existed in 1977–1980. The context for its music is defined by the [[new wave of British heavy metal]] and [[punk rock]], which are characterised by raw sound and low-budget productions. In 2004, retrospective CD by Charlie’ Ungry, ''The Chester Road Album'', was released.
